title: Hybrid Child
synopsis: The skilled craftsman Kuroda created artificial humans called Hybrid Childâ€”creatures who are neither machines nor dolls, but rather a reflection of the love shown to them. While they can feel human emotions and have their own consciousness, they are not real humans and require love to grow.
